title: nullsweep
description: NullSweep is a Python library that detects and handles patterns of missing data in DataFrames.

title: GeoJobCheck
description: Check if the job ad in Linkedin lets you apply from your location.

title: Sentiment Analysis Model
description: A sentiment analysis model trained on a custom dataset about democracy.

title: ABSA Model
description: An ABSA model fine-tuned on a custom dataset in Turkish.

title: modulift
description: A powerful search tool for discovering Python packages based on user queries.

title: optimx
description: An optimization package for solving classic optimization problems using various algorithms.

title: NLI Zero Shot Model
description: An NLI | zero-shot classification model fine-tuned on a custom dataset in Turkish.

title: NER Model
description: NER model fine-tuned on a custom dataset in Turkish.

title: TAPAS Model
description: TAPAS model fine-tuned on a financial datasets.

title: sugardata
description: generates synthetic datasets tailored for transformer-based models across a variety of tasks.

title: Intent Classification Model
description: This is a fine-tuned BERT-based model for intent classification, capable of categorizing intents into 82 distinct labels. It was trained on a consolidated dataset of multilingual intent datasets.

title: Intent Classification Model [Turkish]
description: This is a fine-tuned BERT-based model for Turkish intent classification, capable of categorizing intents into 82 distinct labels. It was trained on a consolidated dataset of multilingual intent datasets, translated and normalized to Turkish.

title: Topic Modeling Model
description: This is a BERTopic model fine-tuned on a custom dataset of Turkish political comments.

title: Prompt Engineering Agent
description: AI agent system that transforms initial prompts into professional-grade prompts.

title: QA Model
description: This model is fine-tuned for extractive question answering on Turkish legal texts. It can extract relevant spans from law articles based on user queries.

title: QA Model
description: This model is a fine-tuned version of facebook/mbart-large-50 for Abstractive Question Answering (QA) in Turkish, trained on a legal text dataset based on Turkish laws. Unlike extractive QA models that select exact spans from the context, this model generates natural, paraphrased answers.

title: T2T Summarization Model
description: This model is a fine-tuned version of mukayese/mt5-base-turkish-summarization, specifically adapted for generating concise and coherent summaries of Turkish news articles. The fine-tuning was performed using the yeniguno/turkish-news-summary-onesentence dataset, which consists of approximately 60,000 Turkish news articles paired with one-sentence summaries. The objective is to enhance the model's ability to produce shorter, more concise, and compact news summaries.

title: GPT2 Poem Generator Model
description: This model is a fine-tuned version of ytu-ce-cosmos/turkish-gpt2-large, trained on 100,000 Turkish poems. It specializes in generating poetry in Turkish with fluency and coherence.

title: Turkish Grammar Correction Model
description: This model is a fine-tuned version of facebook/mbart-large-50-many-to-many-mmt on the GECTurk-generation dataset for the task of Turkish grammar correction. It takes Turkish sentences with grammatical mistakes as input and generates grammatically corrected Turkish text.

title: TR<->EN Translation Model
description: A fine-tuned MarianMT model that translates Turkish prose into English (vice versa) with a deliberate “Kafkaesque” flavour.

title: eksiminer
description: eksiminer is a Python package for scraping entries, topics, authors, and daily highlights from Ekşi Sözlük, one of Turkey's most popular social platforms.

title: rotoml
description: A native Rust ML Agent toolkit
